testcase.name: downloadTransaction
testcase.system-out: Click on Report Module Click on download Sub Module Verify user is on the Download page click on the select merchant filed Enter merchant name in a search merchant functioanlity select merchant name :- mukesh1 select merchant from all merchnat click on Select Bank Enter Merchnat bank name in a Search Bank name text field select merchant name :- Delhi select Bank from all Bank select Merchant Bank from all Merchant bank Select MID from MID dropdown Click on the Date range select date range :- Yesterday Select Time Zone :- Asia/Hong_Kong click on the select currency filed Enter currency name in a search currency functioanlity select merchant name :- INR select Currency from all Currency user select values Bank Transactions Click on Download Button click on the select currency filed click on the OK button

testsuite.system-out: User enter ID in Username field User Enter Password in password field Click on submit button in login page Click on Report Module Click on download Sub Module Verify user is on the Download page click on the select merchant filed Enter merchant name in a search merchant functioanlity select merchant name :- mukesh1 select merchant from all merchnat click on Select Bank Enter Merchnat bank name in a Search Bank name text field select merchant name :- Delhi select Bank from all Bank select Merchant Bank from all Merchant bank Select MID from MID dropdown Click on the Date range select date range :- Yesterday Select Time Zone :- Asia/Hong_Kong click on the select currency filed Enter currency name in a search currency functioanlity select merchant name :- INR select Currency from all Currency user select values Bank Transactions Click on Download Button click on the select currency filed click on the OK button
